game_load_buffer: With this function you can load a game state that has been saved previously. The game is loaded from a previously created "grow" buffer (see Buffers) and the buffer must have had a game state saved to it using game_save_buffer() function.
The buffer id to load from.
The above code will load a previously saved game state from the buffer indexed in the variable "save_buff", only if the global variable is <tt>true</tt>, when the player presses the "L" key.
